渾.definition: muddy; turbid; brainless; foolish; (bound form) simple; natural; (bound form) whole; entire; all over

渾儀註.definition: book by Han dynasty astronomer Zhang Heng

渾厚.definition: simple and honest; unsophisticated; (music etc) deep and resounding

渾圓.definition: perfectly round; (fig.) accommodating; considerate; smooth (way of doing things)

渾天說.definition: geocentric theory in ancient Chinese astronomy

渾水摸魚.definition: to fish in troubled water (idiom); to take advantage of a crisis for personal gain

渾源.definition: Hunyuan county in Datong 大同[Da4 tong2], Shanxi

渾源縣.definition: Hunyuan county in Datong 大同[Da4 tong2], Shanxi

渾然.definition: completely; absolutely; undivided; totally mixed up; muddled

渾然一體.definition: to blend into one another; to blend together well

渾然不知.definition: to be totally oblivious (to sth); to have no idea about sth

渾然天成.definition: to resemble nature itself; of the highest quality (idiom)

渾球兒.definition: variant of 混球兒|混球儿[hun2 qiu2 r5]

渾茫.definition: the dark ages before civilization; limitless reaches; vague and confused

渾身.definition: all over; from head to foot

渾身上下.definition: all over; from head to toe

渾身解數.definition: to give it your all; to go at it with all you've got; to throw your whole weight behind it; also pr. [hun2 shen1 jie3 shu4]
